name: Flying Wild Hog
info:
• 别名: Flying Wild Hog Sp. z o.o.
  • 生日: 2009年
detail: Flying Wild Hog Sp. z o.o. is a Polish video game developer based in Warsaw and founded in 2009. The company is best known for the 2013 reboot of Shadow Warrior, and its 2016 sequel, Shadow Warrior 2.

works.name: Shadow Warrior / 影子武士 重制版
